* Add description of the scedit tool

* Fix wording and example of scinit tool

* Add another testimonial to README

* Fix wording in sc_install_defaults section

* Remove hashtags that GitHub insists are references

2 features: `log_dir` YAML option and new `env` operation

Ignore system group on STRTCPSVR/ENDTCPSVR instance *ALL (#175)

* Don't use option '-a' on STRTCPSVR and ENDTCPSVR when instance is *ALL

The services in group 'system' are being started and ended by their own exit program,
so no need for SC to do this as well.

* Remove redundant info about STRTCPSVR special groups

* Document the use of system group in STRTCPSVR integration

Co-authored-by: Christian Jorgensen <cj@dk.nmp.eu>
